content.description: Sit start just outside of the "cave" walkway with feet underneath on the block below. Work hands left along the lip and engage a heel hook. Work tough moves getting to and then getting over the lip bulge. Top out where you walk off MOW
content.location:
Far Side Boulder:  

  Walk down the trail past the lookout, past the Room, pat the Hive boulder, and round the sharp corner. You will find a huge split boulder which resembles an open 'Pac-man' mouth which is called "Mouth of Wilson"...  

  "The Far Side" is the lip traverse into the blunt arÃªte that to on the opposite side of the MOW patio.

content.description: The Far Side is a fun boulder with only one problem on it. Its located directly to the left of the MOW patio block. The Far Side problem starts in the shady opening of the dark cave/tunnel/gap between the MOW patio and the Far Side Boulder.
